title: "Rivian: I'm Willing To Bet On This Dip; Initiating Coverage At Buy"
text: "Rivian is a smaller player in the EV market compared to Tesla
source_name: but at only 7% of current U.S. vehicle sales
date: the EV market is large enough for multiple players. The company is ramping up production of its more profitable R1S model
topics: while still also delivering its enterprise delivery vehicles. Rivian's main challenge is scaling production and improving gross margins
sentiment: but it has made progress and aims to achieve positive gross profits in 2024."

title: "7 Promising Battery Recycling Stocks to Energize Your Portfolio"
text: "Where will all of the electric vehicle (EV) batteries go when they die? Fortunately
source_name: most won't end up in landfills."
